frame.name: Inchoative_change_of_temperature
frame.definition:
<def-root>In this frame, the temperature of an Item changes. An <fen>Initial_temperature</fen>, <fen>Final_temperature</fen>, or <fen>Temperature_change</fen> can also be indicated.
<ex>The house had <t>cooled</t> <t>off</t> by a few more degrees by midnight, and we finally managed to eat a bite.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Initial_temperature
FE.definition: <def-root>The temperature that the <fen>Item</fen> has prior to the event.</def-root>

FE.name: Final_temperature
FE.definition: <def-root>The temperature of the <fen>Item</fen> after the event.</def-root>

FE.name: Temperature_change
FE.definition: <def-root>The amount of difference between the Initial_temperature and the Final_temperature of the <fen>Item</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Hot_cold_source
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Hot_cold_source</fen> is the source of the heat or coolness</def-root>

FE.name: Cause
FE.definition: <def-root>An event or state-of-affairs that leads to the change in temperature of the <fen>Item</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Container
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Container</fen> that holds the <fen>Item</fen> whose temperature is being changed.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Item</fen> during the temperature change.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The span of time in which the <fen>Item</fen> is changing temperature.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the change in temperature occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location at which the <fen>Item</fen> changes temperature.</def-root>

FE.name: Sub_region
FE.definition: <def-root>A portion of the <fen>Item</fen> which is affected by the temperature change.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The manner in which the <fen>Item</fen> changes temperature.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the temperature change occurs</def-root>

FE.name: Result
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Item</fen> that results from being chilled.</def-root>

FE.name: Particular_iteration
FE.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: cool.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: reach or approach a fairly low temperature

lexUnit.name: refrigerate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: subject (food or drink) to cold in order to chill or preserve it.

lexUnit.name: cool off.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: cause a relative decrease in temperature
